analysis.key_quote: Granting political appointees the power to remove career employees in policy-related roles without the due process protections currently in place opens the door to politicization of the civil service—precisely what the civil service system was designed to prevent.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about undermining the merit-based civil service system and the potential for politicization. It emphasizes the importance of due process and the integrity of civil service protections.
